item.description:
Hi everyone,

We have a location for our first meetup under the new name. Thank you Mahesh for welcoming us in your home.

This meetup will be a potluck. Bring what you can but make sure it is vegan so everyone can have some.

I realize this is out of the way for most members but if you need a ride we have someone coming from Nashua and who is willing to give a ride to anyone along the way. Maybe others will come and offer rides. I live in Raymond so I am not much help.

This should be fun and it will give us a chance to discuss the name change and anything else that may be on your mind.

Thanks,
Linda Dionne

Mahesh will give directions to anyone who asks.
item.name: Manchester Area Vegan/Animal Rights Meetup
